item.title: Sample1: 私にもできること My Style
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will show you how to create a simple theme in Hugo. sss ## this is a comment $ echo this is a command this is a command ## edit the file $vi foo.md +++ date = "2014-09-28" title = "creating a new theme" +++ bah and humbug :wq ## show it $ cat foo.md +++ date = "2014-09-28" title = "creating a new theme" +++ bah and humbug $ Some Definitions There are a few concepts that you need to understand before creating a theme.

item.title: Sample5: バレンタインチョコレート作戦(Happy Valentine!)
item.description: Chocolate ショコラティエが教える、お父さんへのバレンタインチョコレート We’ll start with creating a new site with a very basic template. In this tutorial, commands that you enter will start with the “$” prompt. The output will follow. Lines that start with “#” are comments that I’ve added

item.title: Sample6: 高齢者向けフランス料理講習会(My Grand Father Chef)
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will show you how to create a simple theme in Hugo. I assume that you are familiar with HTML, Here’s an example: ## this is a comment $ echo this is a command this is a command ## edit the file $vi foo.md +++ date = "2014-09-28" title = "creating a new theme" +++ bah and humbug :wq ## show it $ cat foo.md +++ date = "2014-09-28" title = "creating a new theme" +++ bah and humbug $ Some Definitions There are a few concepts that you need to understand before creating a theme.

item.title: Sample7: 地域専門職連携会議(研修・懇親会)

item.title: Sample8: 世界の料理をメニューに(World Gourmet Project)
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will show you how to create a simple theme in Hugo. I assume that you are familiar with HTML, Here’s an example: ## this is a comment $ echo this is a command this is a command ## edit the file $vi foo.md +++ date = "2014-09-28" title = "creating a new theme" +++ bah and humbug :wq ## show it $ cat foo.md +++ date = "2014-09-28" title = "creating a new theme" +++ bah and humbug $ Some Definitions There are a few concepts that you need to understand before creating a theme.
